Platinum Blood Smite.name: Platinum Blood Smite
Platinum Blood Smite.flavor: Although you waver, your conviction lends you strength to strike and push on.
Platinum Blood Smite.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you are bloodied, you or an ally within 5 squares of you can use second wind as a free action.

Bahamut's Liberation.name: Bahamut's Liberation
Bahamut's Liberation.flavor: Your sense of justice, rather than fickle fate, ends your ally’s pain.
Bahamut's Liberation.effect: Negate any ongoing damage affecting the target.

Exemplar's Talon.name: Exemplar's Talon
Exemplar's Talon.flavor: In desperate straits, you strike. Your example as a shining paragon of justice cheers your allies.
Exemplar's Talon.effect: You and each bloodied ally within 5 squares of you regain hit points equal to your armor’s armor bonus (including its enhancement bonus) + your Charisma modifier.
